title: Southern Road Connectivity Project - Expressway Connectivity Improvement Plan - Award of Contract for providing Consulting Services for Screening, Feasibility Study and Detailed Engineering Design of National Highways Linking the Expressway Network
decision_details: -  the proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Highways, Ports and Shipping, to award the above contract as recommended by the Cabinet Appointed Consultancy Procurement Committee (CACPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
